sentences.en: a symbol of God’s everlasting love
Any person who is really profoundly humane can't believe in everlasting punishment.
sentences.cn: 真正非常慈悲的人决不会相信永远的惩罚.

sentences.en: By the same token , the everlasting interdependence is actually an everlasting love.
sentences.cn: 正如, 永远的依存,也是永远的爱.

sentences.en: Don't you see the golden city and the everlasting day?
sentences.cn: 君不见那永恒世界黄金城?

sentences.en: Everybody's tired of your everlasting complaints!
sentences.cn: 大家对你喋喋不休的抱怨感到厌倦了.

sentences.en: God visited everlasting grief upon her.
He believes in everlasting life after death.
sentences.cn: 他相信死后有不朽的生命.

sentences.en: Here was Old Stoeffle's everlasting Quartet.
sentences.cn: 这就是老史朵福永垂不朽的四重奏乐队.

sentences.en: I am tormented with an everlasting itch for things remote.
sentences.cn: 凡是天外的东西总是永远引得我心痒难熬,苦念不已.

sentences.en: I have loved you with an everlasting love!
I'm tired of his everlasting jokes.
sentences.cn: 我对他不断地开玩笑已经感到厌倦了.

sentences.en: Like their everlasting, " I've been twenty years in this country. "
sentences.cn: 就像他们的口头禅: ‘ 我在这个地方住了二十年喽. ’

sentences.en: The boss gets on my wick with his everlasting complaints about timekeeping. And he thinks nothing of rolling up to the office at ten o'clock himself.
sentences.cn: 上司总是抱怨说我们不守时,真令我烦透了. 可是他对自己10点钟才到办公室却一点也不在乎.

sentences.en: The crickets stridulated their everlasting monotonous meaningful note.
sentences.cn: 蟋蟀发出了它们持久的,单调而有意思的调子.

sentences.en: These tyres are advertised as being everlasting.
sentences.cn: 广告上说轮胎持久耐用.

sentences.en: Whatever was true now was true from everlasting to everlasting.
sentences.cn: 凡是现在正确的事情,自会永远正确.

phrases.tran_cn: 开天辟地以来，自古以来

trans.tran_cn: 永久的，永恒的，接连不断，不断的，冗长的，使人厌烦的，[植]干后花的形状颜色不变的
trans.tran_en: continuing for ever, even after someone has died
